analysis.description: TPCToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/13/0x9e5c47e1ed377a28a922ee883bb0cf4b64e60e30.sol#321-328) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/13/0x9e5c47e1ed377a28a922ee883bb0cf4b64e60e30.sol:
	Contract TPCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/13/0x9e5c47e1ed377a28a922ee883bb0cf4b64e60e30.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TPCToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/13/0x9e5c47e1ed377a28a922ee883bb0cf4b64e60e30.sol#298-301) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/13/0x9e5c47e1ed377a28a922ee883bb0cf4b64e60e30.sol#300)

TPCToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/13/0x9e5c47e1ed377a28a922ee883bb0cf4b64e60e30.sol#321-328)
	- /unique_chucks/13/0x9e5c47e1ed377a28a922ee883bb0cf4b64e60e30.sol#326-327
